key_risks: Customer concentration and potential defections impacting revenue
Intense competitive pressures from established and emerging players
Dependence on third-party providers for infrastructure
controversies: 2021 global outage incident affecting major customers
Data privacy and compliance risks in regions with stringent laws
social_issues: Data privacy concerns and potential reputational damage from mishandling personal data
governance_issues: Leadership changes and execution risks under new CEO
Regulatory scrutiny and compliance risks in data handling
